Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $120. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $150. This includes not only the product itself but also a 30-day satisfaction guarantee and free shipping. Don't miss out on this exclusive deal! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
